# Project general coding guidelines

For code style, naming conventions, and code quality use the following guidelines:
- https://github.com/qualisys/Calqulus-Steps/blob/main/docs/index.md
- use only base nodes and step nodes described in guidelines

## Code Style
- Use code styling as shown in examples in guidelines

## Naming Conventions
- Use camelCase for variables, functions, and methods

## Code Quality
- Use meaningful variable and function names that clearly describe their purpose
- Include helpful comments for complex logic
